item.title: 中美谈判继续，亚洲股市有望走高：市场综述
item.description: 在华尔街股市温和走高之后，中美贸易谈判取得进展的暗示将提振亚洲股市开盘。【原文：Asia’s open should be buoyed by hints of progress in US-China trade talks following a muted session on Wall Street where stocks edged higher.】

item.title: S&P 下调华纳兄弟公司债券评级，将其进一步降至垃圾级
item.description: 在华纳兄弟传媒公司宣布分拆后，S&P 全球评级公司将其无担保债券评级下调至垃圾级，并表示正在考虑下调该公司的其他评级。【原文：S&P Global Ratings cut Warner Bros. Discovery Inc.’s unsecured bond ratings deeper into junk status after the media company announced it was splitting up, and said that it’s reviewing downgrading other ratings of the company.】

item.description:

item.title: 韩国最新的信贷恐慌为高风险企业融资蒙上阴影
item.description: 韩国一家私人股权所有的连锁超市出人意料地决定寻求法院主导的重组，这再次引发了当地信贷市场的不安，为李在明总统的新政府带来了早期考验。【原文：The surprise decision by a private equity-owned supermarket chain in South Korea to seek a court-led restructuring is reigniting jitters in the local credit market, creating an early test for the new administration of President Lee Jae-myung.】

item.title: 需求阴霾笼罩，中国太阳能产业蓄势待发
item.description: 中国沮丧的太阳能制造商面临着新的威胁：对其产品的需求即将下降，这很可能给已经供过于求的市场带来压力。【原文：China’s despondent solar manufacturers face a new threat — an imminent drop-off in demand for their products that’s likely to heap pressure on an already oversupplied market.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利在马斯克与特朗普交恶后寻找 xAI 债务买家
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）正在接触更广泛的投资者，以支持伊隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的人工智能初创公司xAI Corp.的50亿美元债务销售需求，这项交易为了解这位亿万富翁与美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）之间的恩怨提供了一个窗口。【原文：Morgan Stanley is reaching out to a broader pool of investors to shore up demand for a $5 billion debt sale for Elon Musk’s artificial intelligence startup xAI Corp., a deal that offers a window into the fallout from the billionaire’s feud with US President Donald Trump.】

item.title: 新西兰威利斯希望新西兰央行增加夏季利率决议的内容
item.description: 新西兰财政部长尼古拉-威利斯（Nicola Willis）希望央行增加利率决策的频率，结束夏季休息三个月的做法，与全球同行保持一致。【原文：New Zealand Finance Minister Nicola Willis wants the central bank to increase the frequency of its rate decisions, ending its practice of a three-month summer break and bringing it in line with global peers.】

item.title: 苹果公司的 macOS Tahoe 将成为在英特尔 Mac 上运行的最终操作系统
item.description: 苹果公司（Apple Inc. ）周一在其开发者大会后表示，新的 macOS Tahoe 26 将是最终的 Mac 操作系统软件，可以在运行英特尔处理器的 Mac 上运行。【原文：Apple Inc.’s new macOS Tahoe 26 will be the final Mac operating system software that will work on Macs running Intel Corp. processors, the company said Monday following its developer conference.】

item.title: Roblox 聘用派拉蒙公司的 Naveen Chopra 担任新首席财务官
item.description: Roblox 公司任命 Paramount Global 的 Naveen Chopra 为新任首席财务官，6 月 30 日生效。【原文：Roblox Corp. tapped Paramount Global’s Naveen Chopra as its new chief financial officer, effective June 30.】

item.title: 富士媒体在激进分子的围攻下继续运作房地产分拆业务
item.description: 富士媒体控股公司（Fuji Media Holdings Inc.【原文：Fuji Media Holdings Inc.’s incoming president said “all options” regarding its real estate operations remain on the table, including a possible spinoff along the lines of activist investor demands.】

item.title: 前官员称日本央行可能放缓缩减购债步伐
item.description: 据一位负责货币政策的前日本央行执行董事称，日本央行可能会在即将召开的董事会会议上放缓下一财年缩减政府债券购买规模的步伐。【原文：The Bank of Japan is likely to slow the pace of tapering its government bond purchases next fiscal year at the board’s upcoming meeting, according to a former BOJ executive director in charge of monetary policy.】

item.title: 帝亚吉欧权衡印度板球队股权方案
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，帝亚吉欧集团正在考虑印度板球超级联赛特许经营商班加罗尔皇家挑战者队的所有权方案。【原文：Diageo Plc is considering options for its ownership of the Indian Premier League cricket franchise Royal Challengers Bengaluru, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 特许学校融资人将破产归咎于与支持者的争吵
item.description: 美国一所特许学校的主要资助者申请破产，原因是大流行病时期的补贴减少了对其服务的需求，以及与第一大股东纽约投资公司 Orthogon Partners Investment Management 发生争执。【原文：A major financier of US charter schools filed bankruptcy, blaming pandemic-era subsidies that reduced demand for its services and a dispute with a top stockholder, New York investment firm Orthogon Partners Investment Management.】

item.title: 喜达屋房地产投资信托基金开始缩减陡峭的提款限额
item.description: Barry Sternlicht 的喜达屋资本公司（Starwood Capital）管理的一家房地产基金在严重限制投资者取回资金的能力一年多后，正在逐步取消赎回上限。【原文：A real estate fund managed by Barry Sternlicht’s Starwood Capital is slowly lifting a cap on redemptions more than a year after it severely limited investors’ ability to retrieve capital.】

item.title: 霍尔茨曼告诉 ORF：欧洲央行在秋季前暂停加息是合理的
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员罗伯特-霍尔兹曼（Robert Holzmann）表示，欧洲中央银行可能会在今年夏天继续按兵不动。【原文：The European Central Bank may be able to keep interest rates on hold over the summer, according to Governing Council member Robert Holzmann.】

item.title: 墨西哥 Coppel 公司将投资 42 亿美元发展电子商务和开设新店
item.description: 墨西哥最大的私营零售商 Grupo Coppel SA 将在五年内斥资 800 亿比索（约合 42 亿美元）进行投资，包括建立一个新的电子商务平台，使数字交易额翻番，达到总销售额的 20%。【原文：Grupo Coppel SA, Mexico’s largest private retailer, will spend 80 billion pesos ($4.2 billion) over five years on investments including a new e-commerce platform to double the portion of digital transactions to 20% of total sales.】

item.title: 如何安装苹果重新设计的操作系统？
item.description: 苹果公司周一发布了即将推出的 iOS 26、iPadOS 26、macOS Tahoe 26、tvOS 26、watchOS 26 和 visionOS 26 更新的首个开发者测试版预览。该软件旨在为应用程序制造商提供一个机会，在秋季大范围推出之前探索视觉上的重新设计和新功能。公测版将于 7 月推出，供那些想提前几个月测试主要软件升级的用户使用。【原文：Apple Inc. on Monday released the first developer beta previews for its upcoming iOS 26, iPadOS 26, macOS Tahoe 26, tvOS 26, watchOS 26, and visionOS 26 updates. The software is intended to give app makers an opportunity to explore the visual redesign and new features ahead of a wide rollout in the fall. A public beta will be available in July for those who want to test the major software upgrades several months in advance.】

item.title: 巴拉圭总统删除比特币帖子，可能是加密货币骗局
item.description: 巴拉圭总统圣地亚哥-培尼亚（Santiago Peña）删除了其 X 账户上的一个帖子，因为加密货币诈骗者声称南美国家已批准将比特币作为法定货币。【原文：Paraguayan President Santiago Peña deleted a post on his X account after a likely hack by crypto scammers who claimed the South American nation had approved Bitcoin as legal tender.】

item.title: CBO称美国可能在8月中旬用尽债务上限措施
item.description: 美国国会预算办公室周一表示，从 8 月中旬到 9 月底，美国政府可能会耗尽足够的资金来及时履行其财政义务。【原文：The US government could run out of enough funds to meet its financial obligations in a timely manner between mid-August and the end of September, the Congressional Budget Office said Monday.】

item.title: 中心桥公司寻求 10 亿美元长期持有加拿大银行
item.description: 据熟悉此事的人士透露，Centerbridge Partners 的目标是筹集约 10 亿美元，以便有更多时间持有其在加拿大 Fairstone 银行的少数股权。【原文：Centerbridge Partners aims to raise about $1 billion to give it more time to hold its minority position in Fairstone Bank of Canada, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 银行为贝恩资本收购 Wingstop 加盟商提供债务支持
item.description: 华尔街的一些银行已经启动了约 10 亿美元债务销售的第一部分，为贝恩资本收购餐饮特许经营商 Sizzling Platter 提供资金，Sizzling Platter 经营的连锁店包括 Little Caesars、Dunkin'、Jersey Mike's 和 Wingstop。【原文：A group of Wall Street banks have launched the first part of a roughly $1 billion debt sale to fund Bain Capital’s acquisition of restaurant franchisee Sizzling Platter, which operates outposts of chains including Little Caesars, Dunkin’, Jersey Mike’s and Wingstop.】

item.title: 罗宾hood 交易员玩 S&P 指数猜测游戏被耍了
item.description: 最终，Robinhood Markets 公司发现自己也陷入了用户青睐的交易中：这种交易更多地受到投机而非确定性的驱动。【原文：In the end, Robinhood Markets Inc. found itself caught in the same kind of trade its users favor: One driven more by speculation than certainty.】

item.title: 中美贸易谈判首日结束后将于周二继续进行
item.description: 据一位美国官员称，中美贸易谈判将持续到第二天，双方希望缓解在技术和稀土元素运输问题上的紧张关系。【原文：Trade talks between the US and China will continue into a second day, according to a US official, as the two sides look to ease tensions over shipments of technology and rare earth elements.】

item.title: 苹果 2025 年开发者大会的主要收获
item.description: 苹果公司 2025 年全球开发者大会内容丰富。以下是其中的亮点：【原文：Apple Inc.’s 2025 Worldwide Developers Conference was jam-packed. Here are the highlights:】

item.title: 德国 SEFE 公司将宣布与阿塞拜疆签订为期 10 年的天然气供应协议
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，德国国有企业 SEFE 预计将宣布一项为期 10 年的协议，从阿塞拜疆国有企业 Socar 购买天然气。【原文：Germany’s state-owned SEFE is expected to announce a 10-year deal to buy gas from Azerbaijan’s state-owned Socar, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 摩根大通称，美联储的利息支付可能会持续下去
item.description: 摩根大通银行（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：A proposal to eliminate the interest paid to banks that deposit cash at the Federal Reserve risks unleashing tremors across the industry, funding markets and US monetary policy, according to JPMorgan Chase & Co. strategists.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织希望津巴布韦黄金支持的 ZiG 成为唯一货币
item.description: 国际货币基金组织表示，在考虑是否将津巴布韦纳入工作人员监督计划时，希望看到 ZiG "完全成为一种国家货币"。【原文：The International Monetary Fund said it would like to see the ZiG “fully becoming a national currency” as it considers whether to place Zimbabwe on a staff-monitored program.】

item.title: 苹果在 WWDC 大会上发布 Liquid Glass 软件界面
item.description: 苹果公司在其年度全球开发者大会上发布了名为 Liquid Glass 的新操作系统界面，称这是该公司有史以来最广泛的设计更新。【原文：Apple Inc. unveiled a new operating system interface called Liquid Glass at its annual Worldwide Developers Conference, calling it the company’s broadest design update ever.】

item.title: 据说 GFL 考虑出售 50 亿加元基础设施部门的股份
item.description: 据知情人士透露，GFL 环境公司正在考虑出售其基础设施部门的股份，这可能是加拿大今年最大的基础设施交易之一。【原文：GFL Environmental Inc. is considering the sale of a stake in its infrastructure arm, people with knowledge of the matter said, in what could be one of Canada’s largest infrastructure deals this year.】

item.title: Trafigura 改组美国交易团队
item.description: Trafigura 集团正在重组其美国交易团队的管理层，长期担任石油交易主管的 Corey Prologo 将担任该公司美国主要部门主席的新职务。【原文：Trafigura Group is reorganizing the management of its trading team in the US, with long-time oil trading chief Corey Prologo set to step into a new role as chair of the company’s main American unit.】
